alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:47AM CST until March 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Highest amounts south of a line from Keosauqua to Macomb. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Missouri, southeast Iowa and west central Illinois. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
